description:
Fortive is seeking a highly motivated and experienced Director of Marketing Analytics, Operations & Optimization to join our dynamic and fast-paced team. In this role, you will be responsible for driving the development and execution of data-driven marketing strategies to support our global business objectives. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in marketing analytics, operations, and optimization, as well as a passion for using data to inform decision-making and drive business growth. If you thrive in a collaborative and results-driven environment and have a proven track record of delivering impactful marketing initiatives, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Develop and implement data-driven marketing strategies to support global business objectives.
Lead and manage a team of marketing analysts and specialists to drive continuous improvements in marketing operations and optimization.
Utilize various data sources and analytics tools to gather insights and drive informed decision-making.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for marketing optimization and develop plans to capitalize on them.
Monitor and analyze marketing performance metrics, providing actionable recommendations for improvement.
Develop and maintain marketing dashboards and reports to track progress and communicate results to stakeholders.
Manage budget and resource allocation for marketing analytics and operations initiatives.
Stay current with industry trends and best practices in marketing analytics, operations, and optimization.
Drive a culture of data-driven decision-making and champion the use of data to inform marketing strategies.
Identify and implement new technologies and tools to enhance marketing operations and analytics capabilities.
Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to gather data and insights for marketing campaigns and initiatives.
Use data and analytics to identify customer segments and develop targeted marketing strategies to reach them.
Monitor and report on competitive landscape and make recommendations for marketing strategies.
Develop and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders to ensure alignment and support for marketing initiatives.
Communicate marketing analytics, operations, and optimization strategies and results to leadership and other relevant stakeholders.

Fortive is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
